definitions.text: someone who practices homosexuality; having a sexual attraction to persons of the same sex
bright and pleasant; promoting a feeling of cheer
full of or showing high-spirited merriment; ; - Wordsworth
examples: when hearts were young and gay
a poet could not but be gay, in such a jocund company
the jolly crowd at the reunion

definitions.text: given to social pleasures often including dissipation
examples: a gay old rogue with an eye for the ladies
girls decked out in brave new dresses
a dress a bit too gay for her years
